field.value: AppDomain Never Releases Many Generated Assemblies - Need new Segregated AppDomain which is unloaded after use

field.name: description
field.value:
Gokhan is waiting on me... I am almost done with this fairly major issue and then I am passin this over.
1) This was not introduced in the VS 2008 work I verified. This is a fundamental issue which is quite serious, as at least for me, I cannot use the tool until this is fixed in either version.
2) The fix is rather extensive so I am focusing just on the VS2008 work, and then I will (post hand-off) create the VS 2005 patch
3) Rather then use the new AddIn namespace in 3.5 (which is probably overkill) I am simply using lightweight AppDomain code injection techniques with all the expected changes (not ever referring to an Assembly in AppDomain 2 in AppDomain 1) so we can cleanly unload it.
Thanks, Damon
